code: import React from'react';import kidneystone from'./Images/kidneystone.jpeg';import migraine from'./Images/migraine.jpeg';import cardio from'./Images/cardio.png';import skindisorders from'./Images/skindisorders.jpeg';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Diseases(){const diseases=[{name:"Kidney Stone",url:kidneystone},{name:"Skin Diseases",url:skindisorders},{name:"Migraine",url:migraine},{name:"Cardiovascular Diseases",url:cardio},{name:"Kidney Stone",url:kidneystone},{name:"Skin Diseases",url:skindisorders},{name:"Migraine",url:migraine},{name:"Cardiovascular Diseases",url:cardio}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"headersnew py-20",children:["Treatment Available for Diseases",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marquee-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"marquee",children:diseases.map((content,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"cardDisease col-xl-3 pr-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"imgi pt-2",src:content.url,alt:"first",style:{borderRadius:'20px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"diseaseName",children:content.name})]},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marquee-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"marqueei",children:diseases.map((content,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cardDisease col-xl-3 pr-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"imgi pt-2",src:content.url,alt:"first",style:{borderRadius:'20px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"diseaseName",children:content.name})]},index))})})]});}export default Diseases;
